price: រឿងនោះហើយដែលយើងពណ៌នាវាប្រាប់អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)អំពីភស្ដុតាងផេ្សងៗ និងអំពីគម្ពីរគួរអានដែលពោរពេញទៅដោយគតិបណ្ឌិត។
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ نَتۡلُوهُ عَلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَٱلذِّكۡرِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: dhālika natlūhu ʿalayka mina al-āyāti wal-dhik'ri al-ḥakīmi
